better this way

def _readloop(self):
        self.auth = requests.AuthObject(self.username, self.password)
        while not self.stopped:
            time.sleep(0.01)
            result = self.get("live.json")
            if not result: break   
            for message in result.messages:
                event = ConvoreEvent()
                event.parse(self, message, result)
                self.doevent(event)
            else: break

you might want to check out https://github.com/adsworth/python-convore my fork of https://github.com/kennethreitz/python-convore. I've been hacking away on it quite a bit and I'll probably rework a lot of it. But it's alpha usable. :)
